page.title: 04Notable Events
page.content:
Notable Events
IN 1985 a new Round Table was formed covering East Dartmoor.It had 23 members from Sea Captains to accountants. Twinning links with Betton in Brittany celebrated 10 years of exchanges.56 french children visited the school for 6 days.Recently 35 people walked the boundary of Moretonhampstead on three Sundays. A new vicar was appointed.The Rev.J.Heath.A fun day was held in aid of the pavillion at the George V playing fields.A small factory unit was opened in Betton Way of small workshops.The schools Deputy Head was promoted to be a Headmaster at a school in Cornwall. The school was involved in the DOMESDAY PROJECT!!!!!
